name: Agent Book Editor
description: A beautiful book-style editor component for creating and editing AI agents with syntax highlighting, auto-save, and file upload capabilities.
author: Promptbook Team

mode.description: Editor mode - create for new agents, edit for existing ones

onSubmit.description: Callback when form is submitted with agent data

abTestText.type: { singular: string; singularCapitalized: string; createCapitalized: string }
abTestText.description: Text labels for the interface customization

backgroundImage.description: URL for the bookmark background image

onExport.description: Callback when export button is clicked (edit mode only)

className.description: Additional CSS class for the component

string_agent_source.description: Branded type for agent source strings containing structured agent data
string_agent_source.format:
Agent Name

PERSONA Description
KNOWLEDGE Sources
STYLE Guidelines
RULE Behavioral rules

features: Syntax highlighting for commitment keywords (PERSONA, KNOWLEDGE, etc.)
Drag & drop file upload for knowledge sources
Responsive design for desktop and mobile
Support for both create and edit modes

examples.title: Create Mode
examples.code:
<AgentBookEditor
  mode="create"
  onSubmit={handleCreateSubmit}
  onClose={() => setIsOpen(false)}
  abTestText={{
    singular: "agent",
    singularCapitalized: "Agent",
    createCapitalized: "Create Agent"
  }}
  backgroundImage="https://example.com/background.jpg"
/>

examples.title: Edit Mode
examples.code:
<AgentBookEditor
  mode="edit"
  onSubmit={handleEditSubmit}
  onClose={() => setIsOpen(false)}
  onExport={handleExport}
  abTestText={{
    singular: "agent",
    singularCapitalized: "Agent",
    createCapitalized: "Create Agent"
  }}
  backgroundImage="https://example.com/background.jpg"
  initialAgentSource={existingAgent}
/>

examples.title: With Custom Styling
examples.code:
<AgentBookEditor
  mode="create"
  onSubmit={handleSubmit}
  onClose={() => setIsOpen(false)}
  abTestText={textLabels}
  backgroundImage={backgroundUrl}
  className="custom-editor"
  bookContainerClassName="custom-book"
/>

commitmentTypes: PERSONA - Agent personality and role description
KNOWLEDGE - Knowledge sources and content references
STYLE - Writing style guidelines and tone
